commandInvokeNotInGuild: You can only use this command in a server.
notGuildAdmin: You must be an administrator to use this command.

downloadMessage.text: Click the link above to start downloading `{doujin.OriginalName}`.

helpMessage.title: Help
helpMessage.about: a Discord bot for browsing and downloading doujinshi
helpMessage.invite: [Join]({guildInvite}) the official server or [invite nhitomi]({botInvite}) to your server.

doujins.title: Doujinshi
doujins.from: Displays all doujinshi from a source.
doujins.read: Shows the pages in a doujinshi.
doujins.download: Sends the download link for a doujinshi.
doujins.search: Searches for doujinshi by their title and tags.

collections.title: Collection Management
collections.view: Shows the doujinshi in a collection.
collections.add: Adds a doujinshi to a collection.
collections.remove: Removes a doujinshi from a collection.
collections.sort: Sorts a collection by a doujinshi attribute.
collections.delete: Deletes a collection, removing all doujinshi in it.

options.title: Options
options.language: Changes the interface language within a server.
options.feedAdd: Subscribes a channel to the given tag.
options.feedRemove: Unsubscribes a channel from the given tag.
options.feedMode: Changes the tag whitelist mode of a channel between `any` and `all`.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.license: This project is licensed under the MIT License.

errorMessage.title: Error
errorMessage.text: This error has been reported. For further assistance, please join the [official Discord server]({invite}).
errorMessage.missingPerms: nhitomi lacks the permissions to send messages in that channel.

welcomeMessage.title: nhitomi is here!
welcomeMessage.download: `{prefix}download` to download a doujinshi as a zip.
welcomeMessage.search: `{prefix}search` to search for doujinshi in the database.
welcomeMessage.language: `{prefix}option language` to change the interface language.
welcomeMessage.help: Please refer to `{prefix}help` for a comprehensive list of commands.
welcomeMessage.openSource: nhitomi is open-source. Give <{repoUrl}> a star!
